name: Emporis
tag_list: structure, skyscraper, building, firm, company, enterprise, database, heights, floors, portal, architectural, corporation, construction, tower, tall, high, wide, architecture, skyscrapers, statistics, commercial, great-buildings, tall-building, real-estat
overview: Emporis is a provider of information regarding the building industry, and manages data about structures in more than two hundred countries. Emporis is the world market leader for information about buildings with 10 or more floors. Emporis manages data which comes from a variety of sources such as data researchers, building-related companies, the public audience, vendors, and an editorial community.
